mapper.select: select s.schedule_id,s.cinema_id, s.movie_id, s.theater_id, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.created, m.movie_title AS movie_title, m.age_rating AS age_rating, t.theater_type AS theater_type, t.screen_no AS screen_no FROM schedule s JOIN movie m ON s.movie_id = m.movie_id JOIN theater t ON s.theater_id = t.theater_id WHERE s.cinema_id = #{cinema_id} ORDER BY s.start_time
